participant_1.background:
I have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better.
My family works to support my dreams.
i have never been on an airplane.
When I'm not volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop, I love to challenge myself by dancing.
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.

participant_2.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Doing great! I am volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop.
That's awesome! I love volunteering! What are you doing with them?
We are building a bird house. It's a fun activity and I love that I get to spend time with my son.
That sounds really great! I'm sure your son is really happy to be spending time with you.
Me too! He's growing up so fast and I want to make the most of the time I have with him.
That's great! I'm sure he appreciates it as well.
I know he does. He tells me all the time how much he loves me.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you're a great parent.
Thank you! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job
